aicanalysis module¶

aicanalysis.calculate_aic(data, models, params, priors={})¶

Calculates AIC of model calculating posterior and than applying AIC formula. Returns a DataFrame of the AIC Values.

Parameters

  • data (dict) – Curve-fitting data.

  • models (dict) – The models used for curve-fitting.

  • params (pandas.DataFrame) – The parameters with which to integrate the models with.

  • priors (dict, optional) – Priors if any. The default is {}.

Returns

table – A DataFrame with AIC values.

Return type

pandas.DataFrame

aicanalysis.get_posterior_args(data, models, params, priors)¶

Supporting function for calculate_aic. Do not run.

aicanalysis.normalize_aic(aic_values)¶

Accepts a list-like array of aic values and returns a normalized array where the lowest value is zero.

aicanalysis.rank_aic(aic_dataframe, aic_column_name='AIC Value', inplace=True)¶

Accepts a dataframe where each row corresponds to one model aic_dataframe cannot have any columns named ‘Evidence’.
